Articles.Content:
This is the story of some kerbals going to laythe. I will show you guys all the missions I run to accomplish my goal.

Some craft seen here are available in my company. If you want one that isn't there, just contact me and i'll upload some download links.

Mission one: Launch of the Laythe tug and ground base.

No crew

Launched by random launcher

Mission two: maintenance mission, objective: check out if tug and base remained undamaged, duration: untill the next module arrives (approx 2 days)

Crew of three: Langas, Al and Ribfrod Kerman

Launched with CDS

everything looks all right
